title: Short-Term Course on Hypermedia-Based Scientific Inquiry and Incidental Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Program centered on hypermedia content navigation and nonlinear learning experiences via mobile devices. Integrates self-directed discovery learning and incidental learning opportunities in daily contexts

learning_goals: Learners can derive connections between scientific concepts in a hypermedia environment with 80% accuracy
Learners perform self-directed scientific inquiry at least five times per week through mobile microlearning modules
Learners can explain science phenomena observed in daily life using hypermedia tools with over 70% frequency
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
